posts.text:
PUNE: AstroSat, the country's multi-wavelength space telescope, has managed the most sensitive measurement of the x-ray polarisation of the Crab pulsar till date. 

In a paper published in 'Nature Astronomy' on Monday, the Indian team of scientists working on the project has documented results of their 18-month study of the Crab pulsar in the Taurus constellation and measured the variations of polarisation as this highly magnetized and exotic object spins around 30 times a second. Astronomers have extensively studied various properties of this radiation to piece together a complete picture of compact objects and their immediate surroundings. The puzzle, however, remained incomplete due to the missing information about the elusive properties of x-rays known as polarisation (see graphics). The scientists using data from the CZT Imager instrument of AstroSat have performed the most sensitive measurement of x-ray polarization of the Crab pulsar. 

"The idea of using pixelated CZT detectors for x-ray polarisation measurement has been around for a while. But this is for the first time that this idea was tested on ground before launch," said Santosh Vadawale of PRL Ahmedabad, the lead author of the paper. He is also part of the CZTI team experienced in handling CZT detectors at Tata Institute of Fundamental Research (TIFR), Harvard and later for the Chandrayaan-1 mission at PRL. "It was a massive ground-calibration effort. We have detailed files on each and every one of the sixteen thousand pixels of CZTI", said Varun Bhalerao of Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay. 

A R Rao of TIFR, the principal investigator of CZTI, said, "Even the brightest sources in the sky give us very few x-ray photons. We had to observe the Crab pulsar many times and combine data taken many months apart. It's a major challenge, given the very small rotation period of the pulsar." The AstroSat team sought help from one of the world's best radio telescopes, Indian Giant Meter-wave Radio Telescope at Khodad near Pune to get the micro-second accuracy required for combining the data. 

Dipankar Bhattacharya of Inter-university Centre for Astronomy and Astrophysics said, "This is a big challenge to theorists . It tells us that the pulsar emission extends into what was thought to be an off-pulse region."

posts.author: 新闻小编7
posts.title: 北臧村镇积极应对雾霾天气做好大气污染防治工作
posts.text:
11月4日0时至2017年11月8日0时，本市启动空气重污染橙色预警，按照《北京市大兴区空气重污染应急工作领导小组办公室关于启动空气重污染应急橙色预警指令的通知》要求，11月3日北臧村镇部署橙色预警期间相关工作，召开相关职能科室负责人会议，要求积极落实机动车限行、施工工地停工、道路清扫保洁、工业企业停产限产、禁放禁烧等各项应急措施，做好应对措施做好大气污染防治工作。
20.jpg (71.29 KB, 下载次数: 31)
下载附件 保存到相册
昨天 14:07 上传
预警期间，镇带班领导带队夜查，包村组长带队巡查，重点清查镇域内工业企业、小门店、散煤禁煤，减少空气污染源，确保落实措施有效果，此次巡查共小门店170家。
21.jpg (101.33 KB, 下载次数: 31)
下载附件 保存到相册
昨天 14:07 上传
重点区域采取集中行动，对物流园区、施工工地进行停工停驶，禁止建筑垃圾、渣土运输车、砂石运输车等重型车辆上路，减少扬尘等。
22.jpg (112.93 KB, 下载次数: 36)
下载附件 保存到相册
昨天 14:07 上传
​
对主要道路进行洒水降尘处理。增加道路清扫保洁频次，出动垃圾清运车6辆，巡查车5辆，保洁员83人对镇域各街道进行清扫保洁，出动洒水车辆对镇域主要道路进行洒水降尘，全面降低道路积尘负荷，防止扬尘污染的发生。

posts.author: EdilbertoSousa (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: NOS BASTIDORES DA SUJEIRA LULA SEMPRE ESTÁ PRESENTE
posts.text: O caminho da verdade A reunião de Lula com Joesley Batista sobre o impeachment de Dilma não se realizou em um hotel em Brasília, como escrevi na coluna de sábado, mas na casa do empresário em São Paulo, segundo denúncia do ex-presidente da Câmara Eduardo Cunha . Em carta redigida de próprio punho na cadeia em Curitiba, Cunha citou um encontro entre ele, Joesley e o ex-presidente no ano passado . “Ele apenas se esqueceu que promoveu um encontro que durou horas no dia 26 de março de 2016, sábado de Aleluia (anterior à Páscoa) na sua residência, entre mim, ele e Lula, a pedido de Lula, para discutir o processo de impeachment (de Dilma Rousseff)”. Cunha afirmou que, no encontro, pôde "constatar a relação entre eles e os constantes encontros que mantinham". Segundo o ex-presidente da Câmara, sua versão pode ser comprovada com o testemunho dos agentes de segurança da Casa , que o acompanharam, além da locação de veículos em São Paulo, que o teriam levado até lá . Por Merval Pereira

posts.author: 证券时报APP
posts.title: 神奇“京东方”：26个交易日换手112%，累计成交2053亿元-财经频道-
posts.text:
证券时报网（www.stcn.com）11月07日讯
周二， 沪指 震荡上扬，在石油、 钢铁 、证券等权重股带领下成功站上3400点。其中 京东方A ( 行情 000725 , 诊股 )再度成为市场关注焦点。该股早间最大跌幅超3%，但午后稳步回升，收盘微跌0.15%，成交量达到了130.8亿元。这也是两周内，第6个交易日成交超过100亿元。
京东方A有多火？看看下面几组数据就知道。
京东方A走势
1、区间最大涨幅65.58%。自9月26日爆发以来，京东方A股价在4元附近启动，短短26个交易日里最大涨幅达到了65.58%。而同期 大盘 涨幅仅为2%。就连牛气哄哄的 贵州茅台 ( 行情 600519 , 诊股 )，其涨幅也不足京东方A的一半。
2、日均成交量达79亿元。该股启动以来，日均成交量持续高涨，10月27日当日成交量达到了109亿元，而10月30日当天更是达到了惊人的155.90亿元。启动以来总成交为2053亿元，日均成交接近79亿元。这是什么概念？A股巨无霸 中国石油 ( 行情 601857 , 诊股 )今年全部成交才651.9亿元； 工商银行 ( 行情 601398 , 诊股 )今年全部成交才1575亿元。二者加起来才略大于京东方A这一个多月来成交量。
3、 换手率 奇高——112%。随着该股上扬，换手率也一路高涨。数据显示，该股在最近26个交易日里，换手率达到了112.44%。
4、208只 基金持股 。据基金三季报披露信息显示，共计有208只基金持有京东方A。其中 社保基金 一零八组合、一零一组合分别持有55003.87万股、22337.15万股，中央汇金资产管理有限公司持有24830.53万股。
机构分析称，京东方A股如此受宠，主要得益两方面：一是，行业景气度大增，面板领域需求旺盛。10月26日，京东方宣布，公司位于成都的第6代柔性AM OLED 生产线提前量产，是正牌OLED龙头；二是，业绩大增，估值迎来修复期。公司前三季度实现收入694亿元，实现净利润64.76亿元，同比增长4503%。
京东方A受市场热捧，从融资榜单也可见一斑。数据显示，截至11月6日，融资客买入达116.2亿元，最近10个交易日里融资净买入19.18亿元。
数据还显示，在过去的10月份超过90家机构对京东方进行了调研。其中中金公司、中泰证券、天风证券、民生证券、 国信证券 ( 行情 002736 , 诊股 )等均给出买入及以上投资评级。其中民生证券给出了最高的9元目标价。距当前收盘价仍有37.8%上涨空间。
机构最新给予京东方A的目标价
